element.label_body: I am Jaq, Your virtual assistant. I'm here to answer your questions. How can I help you?
Please select an option from the menu below.
Jaquar is into complete bathroom solutions. Please select from the menu given below

carousel_items.card_body: New arrivals to our ever-growing range of luxury bathroom products
A great cleansing experience with their high-quality performance and eye-catching designs.
Jaquar Bathroom showers are designed to deliver a range of experiences to let you have a shower of your choice every time.
Jaquar sanitary items have been designed in a unique way that makes sure to go beyond just a sense of comfort.
Thermostatic shower valves, you can control the temperature of the water using modern technology.
Jaquar's water heater and geysers are of high-quality, and also assure you of its safety!
Jaquar whirlpool baths are an excellent way to boost circulation naturally throughout the body.
The bathtub design is conventionally narrow and elongated, designed to fit an adult laying back and relaxing.
Jaquar's spa tubs are a technological wonder created to let you relax and restore the balance of body and mind.
Home sauna's wooden interiors and temperature controls allow you to find that sweet spot.
Shower Enclosure has become an integral part of the Modern Bathroom
Jaquar's bathroom accessories are affordable and give you value for money!
Jaquar steamer for the bathroom is a great way to enjoy the benefits of humidifying water vapour from a high-quality steam
Shower panels are a single unified system that consists of various functions to experience a luxurious shower experience.
Modern flush tank designs offer a sleek look to bathroom spaces along with efficient features like water-saving, easy access etc.
A Complete Bathroom Solutions where you can conceptualize your own bathroom concept
Click here to go to previous menu

element.label_body: We have categorized our lighting products in two different sections please choose from below.
Jaquar offers various professional lighting products. Please select from the menu given below

carousel_items.card_body: Jaquar guardrail lights and handrail lights are a unique product solution designed to be a integrated part of the rails.
Jaquar ground burials are designed to enhance architectures, they can be used in varied applications like column uplighter, tree uplighter, etc.
Jaquar trunking lights have seamless body and invisible connector design for beautiful aesthetics and are designed to create a even and soothing lighting effect.
Jaquar spot projectors provide best in class optics from ultra narrow beam to wide beam.
Jaquar underwater lights are designed with high a quality 304/316 Stainless Steel housing which allows for longer life in both fresh water as well as salt water.
Introducing a wide range of high performance Linear Wall washers designed to highlight key architectural features of buildings or projects.
Jaquar introduces a specialized selection of window lights to meet various applications.
Building on the legacy of wall washers, Jaquar has launched the linear inground series of luminaires.
Linear Lights are a especially designed direct view luminaires which come with anti glare technology.

element.label_body: Jaquar offers various consumer lighting products. Please select from the menu given below

carousel_items.card_body: LED Downlights for consumer by Jaquar.
LED Battens for consumer by Jaquar.
LED Panels for consumer by Jaquar.
LED Bulbs for consumer by Jaquar.
LED Spot Lights for consumer by Jaquar.
LED Strip Lights for consumer by Jaquar.
LED Street Lights for consumer by Jaquar.
